responsibilities: Promoted from Instructor in February 2023

Instructed bootcamps and accelerated programs, covering a multitude of different languages and concepts including: HTML/CSS, JavaScript (fundamentals and advanced), Git, React, React-Router, Firebase, Accessibility (primarily the core requirements under WCAG) and implementation of modern web design.
Helped over 200+ individuals through 10+ cohorts develop their skills, and succeed in their tech careers.

Key activities included troubleshooting code, re-conceptualizing ideas and best practices during 1:1 and group mentor sessions, providing lectures on post-bootcamp content as well as soft-skill building (interview prep and portfolio critiques).

Provided detailed and individualized feedback on projects and assignments, emphasizing performance optimization, adherence to modern best practices, and accessibility improvements to achieve learning objectives.

Developed and updated curricula for full-time bootcamp, part-time bootcamp, and accelerated programs to incorporate changes in technology, new lesson content, and improve the clarity of existing content.

Diagnosed and solved technical issues relating to core Juno repositories and the main Juno website as part of a task force, including migration to a newer codebase, implementation of new services, and reviewing program improvements.
